prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with vibrant floral features and a cheerful demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a flourishing garden, bright and lively.
Generate a small Pokemon with cute round shapes and colorful plant decorations.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mix between a flower and a playful creature.
Imagine a nature-loving Pokemon with a gentle personality and green leafy body.
Design a Pokemon with a flowery crown and soft green petals for a calming effect.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that thrives in lush environments and loves to dance.
